summary: SummaryReveal your skin's true radiance. The BLK/OPL Even True Skin Brightening Bar is a creamy, gently exfoliating bar that helps to bring your most vibrant skin to the surface. Feel-good skin is just a wash away.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsMade with Shea Butter and Jojoba Oil, this creamy, conditioning bar soap is safe for most skin types.Formulated for dull, dry skin, it's infused with Turmeric and Licorice to gently exfoliate away flaky, dead skin cellsNatural Oats and Aloe Vera replenish moisture and hydration for covetable softness and a brighter, healthier glow.Item 2608009How To UseThis soap lathers into a creamy, silky, milky foam that feels smooth and luscious.IngredientsSodium Palmate, Sodium Cocoate, Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Avena Sativa (Oat Kernel) Flour, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Protein, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Morus Alba (Mulberry) Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Powder, Pentasodium Pentetate.
how_to_use: This soap lathers into a creamy, silky, milky foam that feels smooth and luscious.

reviews.headline: Nothing more than Dial bar soap
reviews.comments: This is really nothing more than a Dial bar soap. However, Dial has antibacterial properties which this does not. Ive always been a Dial soap girl! This did nothing new for me. Neutral. Did not make me break out, but also did not improve my skin, either.

reviews.headline: Nervous for no reason
reviews.comments: The other comments scared me unnecessarily. This soap is not too abrasive. I have lip scrubs that are more abrasive. I dont see a huge positve change after 2 ish weeks, but I definitely don't see anything negative, so I'll keep using. I have normal skin.

reviews.headline: Its okay
reviews.comments: Its okay i dont really see a difference

reviews.headline: Buy It! You won't be disappointed.
reviews.comments: I was on the hunt for a product that would quickly fade my acne scars and hyperpigmentation and this did not disappoint. Within a week, the acne scars on my forehead diminished. This soap along with kojic acid has brightened my skin greatly. BUY IT!

media.headline: Buy It! You won't be disappointed.

faceoff_positive.comments: Makes my face smooth and clears the blemishes from my face. I love this soap. I always buy six at a time, so I will not run out
faceoff_positive.headline: Black Opal Skin Brightening Soap

faceoff_negative.comments: I used this as a shower soap. The soap cleans well, is moisturizing but is too abrasive. The exfoliating pieces literally left scratch marks on my skin. An exfoliating soap should be able to be applied directly to skin without pain and scarring.
faceoff_negative.headline: This should be a liquid soap instead of a bar
